alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, west central Camden, southwestern Brantley, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Stephen Foster State Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, St. George, Race Pond and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
